content:
Today I chose PR #19329 for discussion!

perf(CI): automatically benchmark PRs when they are opened
Created by @damiano (@adomani) on 2024-11-21
Labels: WIP, CI

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
This was an experiment, but there are now automatic benchmarks of every merged PR, so this seems much less relevant now. I am closing the PR.
